title: Healing Touch Chiropractic Patient Resources
description: We have a community to help you with anything in your health that may arise! Contact us today!
cleaned_text: Patient Resources Optimizing Communication Brain to Body [American Chiropractic Association](https://www.acatoday.org/Patients) [Chiropractic & Kids?International Should Children Have Chiropractic Care](http://icpa4kids.org/Wellness-Articles/why-should-children-have-chiropractic-care.html) [What Can Chiropractic Do for Your Child](http://icpa4kids.org/Wellness-Articles/what-can-chiropractic-do-for-your-child.html) [Questions Parents Safety of Researcher's Perspective](http://icpa4kids.org/Chiropractic-Research/the-safety-of-chiropractic-for-children-a-researchers-perspective.html) [Chiropractic and Ear Infections: What We Offer Makes A Difference](http://icpa4kids.org/Wellness-Articles/chiropractic-and-ear-infections-what-we-offer-makes-a-difference.html) [Chiropractic Care of Children With Colic](http://icpa4kids.org/Wellness-Articles/chiropractic-care-of-children-with-colic.html) [Top Athletes Utilize Chiropractic Care for Better Performance](http://icpa4kids.org/Wellness-Articles/top-athletes-utilize-chiropractic-care-for-better-performance.html) Prenatal: [The Webster Technique: A technique for pregnant Turn, Turn: An Option for Breech Babies](http://icpa4kids.org/Wellness-Articles/turn-turn-turn-options-for-turning-and-birthing-breech-babies.html) [Chiropractic for Easier Safer Births](http://icpa4kids.org/Wellness-Articles/chiropractic-care-in-pregnancy-for-safer-easier-births.html) Births & Midwives](http://www.alabamabirthcoalition.org/information.html) Maximizing Exercise Free Local Resources: [Christ United Methodist Church: Gym, Walking Track & Fitness Classes?](http://www.christumcsports.com/rec-facilities.php) - Cottage Hill Baptist Church: The ROC - Cottage Hill Medal of Honor Park - Outdoor walking loop & trails [Port City Pacers - Local Runs](http://www.pcpacers.org/index.html) - Free Running Shoe Fitting [Joe Sims @ McCoy Outdoors](www.mccoyoutdoorco.com) Affiliate Links Avoiding/Efficiently Detoxifying - Fun To Do : Fill Out [Toxicity Questionnaire Here](https://www.standardprocess.com/Standard-Process/Purification-Program/Toxicity)(immediate results, no giving email or buying anything, just bring in your results to the office at your next appointment :) [Skin Deep Safety Cosmetic Databas](http://www.ewg.org/skindeep/#.WXbPKIjyuUk)e (look up how toxic your personal care items, cleaning products, etc are 0-10!) [Environmental Working Group (EWG)](http://www.ewg.org/): Know Your Environment. Protect Your Health. [EWG's 11th Annual Guide to Sunscreens:](https://www.ewg.org/sunscreen/#.WXbPR4jyuUk)Sunscreen Safety Ratings That Help You Make the Right Purchase [Is the Childhood Vaccine Schedule Safe?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=43hUZ76rD54&feature=youtu.be) [National Vaccine Information Center](http://www.nvic.org/) [Mercury Free Dentistry](http://mercury.mercola.com/) [The World List](http://www.beautycounter.com/the-never-list/).
